Uses of Class
com.basho.riak.client.builders.RiakObjectBuilder

  • Packages that use RiakObjectBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.basho.riak.client.builders
    These builders provide a fluid API for creating instances of some immutable (or mainly immutable classes) that have a large number of constructor parameters.

    • Uses of RiakObjectBuilder in com.basho.riak.client.builders
